an7.25:1.1: “Mendicants, I will teach you seven principles that prevent decline.
an7.25:1.3: And what are the seven principles that prevent decline?
an7.25:1.4: As long as the mendicants are faithful …
an7.25:2.6: wise, they can expect growth, not decline.
an7.25:3.1: As long as these seven principles that prevent decline last among the mendicants, and as long as the mendicants are seen following them, they can expect growth, not decline.”
